post.body: Good luck and be careful.
Are you looking for product or feedback or just to get out new info? I'm cool w/ both, just curious.
Welcome!
Hey have you seen Pani's new scene files? A few are interesting. http://www.panasonic.com/scenefiles
BTW....Aloha to my new followers!
When the terminal outputs stuff, all I read is blah, blah, error, blah, blah, rejected... i have a new respect for programmers
Compiling a new MySQL install, don't worry, me twittering about it is just as boring as actually having to witness it in the terminal
...more rails errors...
Sidebar: reading "the tale of despereaux" to the kids. It's a VERY dark book.
I'm basically paying $65/month 1998 dial-up speeds.
I will use this opportunity to remind everyone how sucktacular Sprint's wireless Internet is.
So left-brained me must try to perform a right-brained computer programming task.
I am an IDEA person. I need other people to actually do the work. Alas, budget constraints prevent that from happening with this project.
Rails is killing me! Every step forward results in 5 steps back. : (
I can hear my husband mocking me now "you had the dream!" (kung fu panda reference)
more rails....i dreamed about Prototype and Scriptaculous all night last night.
Watching "Tropic Thunder", this movie is redonkulous.... it's funny, yet so wrong.
Building some ruby on rails apps. Its amazing how much easier things are with a book!
How are the icons of people we follow organized? Length of time using Twitter? Number of updates? Followers?
It's funny that @maxon3d would friend me just as I'm about to start the Quickstart Animation tutorial.
